introduction: Ever wanted to be a musician? For audio and transcript downloads, a quiz and a list of the words and

vocabulary.definition: performing in a public place for money
vocabulary.example: Josh has been busking on the streets of London for years.

vocabulary.definition: an informal way to talk about a group of people
vocabulary.example: She met a bunch of friends at the music festival.
Her freelance writing became her main earner after she quit her job.
The band is performing at multiple gigs this weekend.
The experienced professor took the young researcher under her wing.

vocabulary.definition: events where anyone can sing or play music
vocabulary.example: They discovered a talented singer at the local open mic night.

vocabulary.definition: meetings for people interested in writing their own music
vocabulary.example: She found inspiration for her new song at the songwriters' circle.

vocabulary.definition: have success or happiness because of someone or something
vocabulary.example: He owes a lot to his mentor for guiding him through his career.
